amendment.description: Amendment adds veteran status as an additional item for consideration when selecting individuals for the Federal Cyber Scholarship for Service program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 111-410 to add veteran status as an additional item for consideration when selecting individuals for the Federal Cyber Scholarship for Service.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Halvorson amendment (A019) Agreed to by recorded vote: 424 - 0 (Roll no. 39).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Mrs. Halvorson.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
